1472430.name: Sketchy Fables
1472430.description:
You wake up in your bedroom, at home, with a mysterious card in handâ€”a heartfelt invitation to visit your grandmother, who resides in the tallest skyscraper of the bustling city. The world is open before you, but will you set out to see her, or will unexpected events lead you down a completely different path? The choice is yours.

ğŸ¨ Fully Hand-Drawn World
Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted game world featuring over 10,000 unique, hand-drawn and animated artworks.

ğŸ—ºï¸ Epic Exploration
Embark on a journey through diverse environments, from charming villages to vast, rural landscapes, each brimming with life and mystery.

ğŸ” Uncover the Unknown
Dive into engaging questlines, discover hidden collectibles, unravel deep secrets, and challenge your mind with intricate puzzles.

âœ¨ Personalized Adventure
Experience a game focused on personal exploration, filled with countless random encounters and surprises waiting to be found.

ğŸµ Play the Handpan
Discover the soothing tones of the handpanâ€”a unique musical instrument you can play within the game to create immersive soundscapes. Your music can solve puzzles, lift spirits, and shape the world around you.

Let your curiosity guide youâ€”this game is a celebration of creativity, wonder, and discovery.
